基于 Deno + Preact + Tailwind CSS 的现代化全栈 W: Modern full-stack web framework based on Deno + Preact + Tailwind CSS, making web development simpler, faster, and more efficient.
只需几分钟，即可开始使用 DWeb 构建您的下一个 Web 应用: Start building your next web app with DWeb in just a few minutes
基于现代 Web 技术构建，提供最佳开发体验: Built on modern web technologies for the best developer experience
现代 JavaScript/TypeScript 运行时，内置安全性和现代 We: Modern JavaScript/TypeScript runtime with built-in security and modern Web API support
轻量级 React 替代品，提供相同的 API 但体积更小、性能更好: Lightweight React alternative with the same API but smaller size and better performance
实用优先的 CSS 框架，快速构建现代化的用户界面: Utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building modern user interfaces
准备开始构建您的应用了吗？: Ready to start building your app?
立即开始使用 DWeb，体验现代化的 Web 开发方式: Start using DWeb now and experience the modern way of web development
DWeb 提供了现代化 Web 开发所需的所有功能: DWeb provides all the features needed for modern web development
DWeb 提供了现代化 Web 开发所需的所有功能，让您专注于业务逻辑: DWeb provides all the features needed for modern web development, allowing you to focus on business logic
探索 DWeb 框架的所有强大功能: Explore all the powerful features of the DWeb framework
看看使用 DWeb 开发有多简单: See how simple it is to develop with DWeb
基于文件系统的自动路由，类似 Next.js。只需在 routes 目录下创建文: File-system based automatic routing, similar to Next.js. Just create files in the routes directory to automatically generate routes without manual configuration. Supports dynamic routes, nested routes, and API routes.
支持 SSR（服务端渲染）、CSR（客户端渲染）和 Hybrid（混合渲染）三种: Supports SSR (Server-Side Rendering), CSR (Client-Side Rendering), and Hybrid rendering modes. Flexibly choose based on page requirements to achieve optimal performance and SEO.
开发时实时热更新，支持服务端和客户端组件热替换。修改代码后立即看到效果，无需手动: Real-time hot updates during development, supporting hot replacement of server and client components. See changes immediately after modifying code without manually refreshing the page, greatly improving development efficiency.
灵活的中间件系统，支持链式调用和异步处理。内置日志、CORS、Body Pars: Flexible middleware system supporting chained calls and asynchronous processing. Built-in common middleware such as logging, CORS, Body Parser, compression, security, rate limiting, and authentication, ready to use out of the box.
强大的插件系统，支持 Tailwind CSS、自定义插件等。提供完整的插件生命: Powerful plugin system supporting Tailwind CSS, custom plugins, etc. Provides complete plugin lifecycle hooks to flexibly extend framework functionality.
内置 Cookie 和 Session 管理功能，支持安全的会话存储和配置。提供: Built-in Cookie and Session management, supporting secure session storage and configuration. Provides simple and easy-to-use APIs to easily handle user authentication and state management.
基于文件系统的函数式 API 路由，支持 GET、POST 等多种请求方式。通过: File-system based functional API routes supporting GET, POST, and other request methods. Call functions directly via URL paths, simplifying API development.
完整的 TypeScript 类型定义，提供优秀的开发体验和类型安全。所有 AP: Complete TypeScript type definitions providing excellent developer experience and type safety. All APIs have complete type hints, reducing development errors.
基于 Deno 运行时，内置安全性和现代 Web API 支持。无需复杂的构建配: Based on the Deno runtime, with built-in security and modern Web API support. No complex build configuration required, directly use ES Modules and enjoy modern JavaScript features.
支持单应用和多应用两种模式。单应用模式适合简单项目，多应用模式适合大型项目，可灵: Supports both single-app and multi-app modes. Single-app mode is suitable for simple projects, while multi-app mode is suitable for large projects, offering flexible choices.
内置环境变量管理功能，支持 .env 文件、类型转换、默认值等。提供 env(): Built-in environment variable management supporting .env files, type conversion, default values, etc. Provides env() API for easy access to environment variables.
内置健康检查端点，支持基础健康检查、就绪检查和存活检查。方便监控和运维，确保应用: Built-in health check endpoints supporting basic health checks, readiness checks, and liveness checks. Convenient for monitoring and operations to ensure the application runs normally.
DWeb 是一个现代化的全栈 Web 框架，基于 Deno + Preact +: DWeb is a modern full-stack web framework built with Deno + Preact + Tailwind CSS
DWeb 是一个基于 Deno + Preact + Tailwind CSS: DWeb is a modern full-stack web framework based on Deno + Preact + Tailwind CSS. It aims to provide a high-performance, easy-to-use developer experience, enabling developers to quickly build modern web applications.
DWeb 借鉴了 Next.js、Remix 等优秀框架的设计理念，同时充分利用: DWeb draws on the design philosophies of excellent frameworks like Next.js and Remix, while fully utilizing the modern features of Deno, offering powerful features such as file system routing, multiple rendering modes, middleware systems, and plugin systems.
无论是构建简单的静态网站，还是复杂的全栈应用，DWeb 都能为您提供最佳的支持。: Whether building simple static websites or complex full-stack applications, DWeb can provide you with the best support.
DWeb 基于以下现代 Web 技术构建: DWeb is built on the following modern web technologies
现代 JavaScript/TypeScript 运行时，内置安全性和现代 We: Modern JavaScript/TypeScript runtime with built-in security and modern Web API support. Deno provides a better developer experience without complex build configurations.
轻量级 React 替代品，提供相同的 API 但体积更小、性能更好。Preac: Lightweight React alternative providing the same API but smaller size and better performance. Preact is only 3KB but fully functional, making it an ideal choice for building modern web applications.
实用优先的 CSS 框架，快速构建现代化的用户界面。Tailwind CSS v: Utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building modern user interfaces. Tailwind CSS v4 provides better performance and more flexible configuration options.
DWeb 的设计遵循以下核心原则: DWeb's design follows these core principles
提供直观的 API 和清晰的文档，让开发者能够快速上手，专注于业务逻辑而不是框架: Provides intuitive APIs and clear documentation, allowing developers to get started quickly and focus on business logic rather than framework configuration.
基于 Deno 和 Preact 等高性能技术，提供多种渲染模式，确保应用在各种: Based on high-performance technologies like Deno and Preact, offering multiple rendering modes to ensure optimal performance in various scenarios.
内置 HMR、TypeScript 支持、完整的类型定义，提供优秀的开发体验，让: Built-in HMR, TypeScript support, and complete type definitions provide an excellent developer experience, making development more efficient and enjoyable.
强大的中间件和插件系统，支持自定义扩展，满足各种业务需求，同时保持框架的简洁性。: Powerful middleware and plugin systems support custom extensions to meet various business needs while maintaining the framework's simplicity.
